pageDesc: Our values and vaulted us to the top of our industry.
aboutTitle: We don't just build buildings — we build trust, „Lim Group“, we are your reliable partners in the construction industry
whoWeAreText: Lim Group has been operating in the Georgian construction market since 2006. We have a strong, professional and development-oriented team that provides high-quality, safe and efficient construction projects. The company is actively engaged in both civil and industrial construction and creates high-standard infrastructure throughout Georgia.

points.standards: Successful cooperation in the public and private sectors
points.trust: A team of professionals, always ready for challenges

subtitle: Plan + Control
title: How it Works

steps.title: Phase Plan
steps.description: This step connects the design process and its milestones with construction.

steps.title: Design Pull Plan
steps.description: We work with the design team to establish a detailed plan for reaching our goals.

steps.title: Coordinated Layout
steps.description: This process creates a single point of truth: drawings all project.

steps.title: Quality Control
steps.description: Having geometry worked out in the Layout step, prior to construction.

benefits: Labor expenses are a common target for cost reduction measures in the construction industry
A good material management system includes proper communication, scheduling, and tracking tools.
Faster supplies can be used upon delivery to a construction site, the better.
Effective material management systems not only ensure that materials are in the right place
